General.Name: 1844 Resources Inc
General.Description: 1844 Resources Inc. engages in the identification, exploration, and development of mineral properties. The company primarily explores for copper, gold, zinc, cobalt, and molybdenum deposits. Its principal project portfolio includes the Lac Arsenault project consisting of 75 mining claims covering an area of approximately 3,918 hectares; the Lac Crystal project comprises 44 claims; the Vortex project consisting of 40 mining claims covering an area of approximately 24 square kilometers; and the Native Copper project comprises 295 mining claims covering an area of 127.65 square kilometers located in the Gaspé Peninsula. The company was formerly known as Gespeg Resources Ltd. and changed its name to 1844 Resources Inc. in January 2021. 1844 Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Saskatoon, Canada.
General.Address: 224 4th Avenue South, Saskatoon, SK, Canada, S7K 5M5
